TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlForm extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項是 Web Form 網頁上的伺服器控制項的容器。The control is a container for server controls on a Web Forms page. 回傳至伺服器的所有伺服器控制項必須都放置的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。All server controls that post back to the server must be placed between the opening and closing tags of an control. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 允許只有一個為作用中的 Web Form 網頁上的控制項。ASP.NET allows only a single control to be active on a Web Forms page. 如果有一個以上作用Web Form 網頁，通用語言執行平台上的控制項將會擲回要求頁面時的例外狀況。If there is more than one active control on a Web Forms page, the common language runtime will throw an exception when you request the page. 不過，您可以使用控制在何處每物件包含一個控制項，因為只有一個可在任何指定時間。You can, however, use a control where each object contains one control, because only one is active at any given time. 您可以控制行為的藉由設定其屬性的控制項。You can control the behavior of the control by setting its properties. 若要指定表單的資料的編碼類型，設定屬性。To specify the encoding type for the form's data, set the property. 方法 (`GET`或是`POST`) 會將表單資料發佈到伺服器的設定，來指定處理瀏覽器屬性。The method (`GET` or `POST`) that a browser uses to post form data to the server for processing is specified by setting the property. > [!CAUTION] > 預設的情況下， 屬性設定為 `POST`。By default, the property is set to `POST`. 您可以修改此屬性的值`GET`，但這可能會中斷的內建的狀態和回傳 ASP.NET 網頁架構所提供的服務。You can modify the value of this property to `GET`, but this might break the built-in state and postback services provided by the ASP.NET page framework. 您可以設定控制項，可實作張貼至不同的目標頁面的介面。You can configure controls that implement the interface to post to a different target page. 這稱為跨網頁公佈。This is referred to as cross-page posting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 中的跨網頁公佈](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來建立簡單的表單。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to create a simple form. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 跨網頁公佈在 ASP.NET Web 網頁

span.span: Cross-Page Posting in an ASP.NET Web Page

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 表單 」 常值字串。The "form" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體控制，並將它放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and place it on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlFormCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormCtor/CS/htmlformctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlFormCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormCtor/VB/htmlformctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 HTML 表單的 action 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the action attribute of the HTML form.

value.span: HTML 表單的 action 屬性。

span.span: The action attribute of the HTML form.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性，當您重新撰寫原始要求的 URL，但您想要保留的 HTML 表單的 action 屬性的原始 URL。You use the property when you rewrite the URL of the original request but you want to retain the original URL for the action attribute of the HTML form. 設定屬性設為您想要保留的 url 值。Set the property to the value of the URL that you want to retain.

summary.span: 取得 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 為 控制項產生的控制項識別碼

span.span: Gets the control identifier that is generated by [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] for the control

value.span: 所產生的控制項識別項[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]針對控制項。

span.span: The control identifier generated by [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免命名衝突，當呈現控制項的多個執行個體，[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]會自動產生的唯一頁面上的每個控制項的值。To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered, [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] automatically generates a unique value for each control on a page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Control Identification

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的子控制項，它會在按下 ENTER 鍵時引發回傳。

span.span: Gets or sets the child control of the control that causes postback when the ENTER key is pressed.

value.span: 載入 時，顯示為預設按鈕的按鈕控制項 。

span.span: The of the button control to display as the default button when the is loaded.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定的使用者，可能導致回傳表單 （例如文字方塊） 中的輸入控制項中按 ENTER。The property lets you specify that users can cause a postback by pressing ENTER in an input control in the form (such as a text box). 您可以指定為預設按鈕的任何控制項衍生自除了介面控制項。You can specify as a default button any control that derives from the interface except the control. 如果所參考的控制項屬性不是衍生自、擲回例外狀況。If the control that is referenced by the property does not derive from , an exception is thrown. 如果您使用主版頁面，而且您設定屬性從內容頁面上，使用屬性 按鈕。If you are using master pages and you set the property from a content page, use the property of the button. 如需有關主版頁面的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 主版頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b)。For more information about master pages, see [ASP.NET Master Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b). 屬性可能會導致回傳，在下列情況：The property might not cause a postback in the following scenarios: - 當焦點是在表單中輸入的控制項之外，請按下 ENTER。Pressing ENTER when focus is outside the input controls in the form. 不保證會觸發預設回傳的動作。The default postback action is not guaranteed to be triggered. - 當焦點是多行文字方塊內時，請按下 ENTER。Pressing ENTER when focus is inside a multi-line text box. 在多行文字方塊中，預期的行為會是在文字方塊中，按下 ENTER 鍵會建立新的一行。In a multi-line text box, the expected behavior is that pressing ENTER creates a new line in the text box. 在某些瀏覽器中，按 ENTER 鍵在多行文字 方塊中觸發程序內回傳。In some browsers, pressing ENTER inside a multi-line text box triggers a postback. 在此情況下，如果您想要改為建立新的一行輸入時，您可以附加的 JavaScript 函式的輸入控制項。In that case, if you want ENTER to create a new line instead, you can attach a JavaScript function to the input control. 指令碼應該擷取 ENTER 鍵，並停止回傳。The script should capture the ENTER key and stop the postback. 例如，您可以使用要加入的用戶端指令碼的屬性集合`onKeyPress`事件。For example, you can use the property collection to add client script for the `onKeyPress` event. - 指定控制項做為預設按鈕。Specifying a control as a default button. 只有和支援控制項。Only and controls are supported. - 變更非同步回傳期間，以程式設計方式的屬性。Changing the property programmatically during an asynchronous postback. 可以藉由新增一或多個頁面上啟用非同步回傳至網頁的控制項。Asynchronous postbacks can be enabled on a page by adding one or more controls to the page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)並[網頁局部呈現概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性來設定預設的控制項造成回傳。The following example shows how to set the property to set the default control that causes a postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/CS/htmlform.defaultbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/VB/htmlform.defaultbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 當做預設按鈕參考的控制項不是 型別。

span.span: The control referenced as the default button is not of the type .
ASP.NET Master Pages Overview

summary.span: 取得或設定表單上的控制項，此控制項在載入 控制項時，會顯示為具有輸入焦點的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the control is loaded.

value.span: 表單上的控制項 ，此控制項在載入 時，會顯示為具有輸入焦點的控制項。

span.span: The of the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the is loaded.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取表單顯示為具有輸入控制項上的控制項焦點時控制項載入。Use the property to access the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the control is loaded. 可以選取的控制項會顯示視覺提示，表示它們具有焦點。Controls that can be selected are displayed with a visual cue indicating that they have the focus. 比方說，插入點放在其內部顯示具有焦點的控制項。For example, a control with focus is displayed with the insertion point positioned inside of it. 具有焦點的控制項也可以設定使用或方法。The control with focus can also be set using the or methods. 這些方法的優先順序高於屬性。These methods have precedence over the property. 若其中一種方法會呼叫以設定控制項焦點，值屬性會被忽略。If either of these methods are called to set the control with focus, the value of the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性，以指定的控制項在表單上顯示為具有輸入焦點的控制項，當表單載入時。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to display a specified control on a form as the control with input focus when the form loads. 當`Form1`轉譯，請注意，插入點位於`TextBox1`，這表示，`TextBox1`是擁有焦點的控制項。When `Form1` renders, notice that the insertion point is positioned in `TextBox1`, indicating that `TextBox1` is the control with focus. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/CS/htmlform.defaultbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/VB/htmlform.defaultbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定將表單資料傳送至伺服器時瀏覽器所使用的編碼類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding type a browser uses when posting the form's data to the server.
A string that contains the encoding type.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示使用了瀏覽器的預設內容類型。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that the browser's default content type is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的編碼類型瀏覽器使用張貼至伺服器的資料。Use the property to specify the encoding type a browser uses to post data back to the server. 下表顯示常見的編碼類型。The following table shows the common encoding types. |編碼類型Encoding type|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |application/x-www-form-urlencodedapplication/x-www-form-urlencoded|表單資料會編碼成名稱/值組。Form data is encoded as name/value pairs. 這是標準的編碼格式。This is the standard encoding format.| |multipart/form-datamultipart/form-data|表單資料會以每個頁面上的控制項的個別組件的訊息編碼。Form data is encoded as a message with a separate part for each control on the page.| |text/plaintext/plain|表單資料是以純文字，而不需要任何控制項或格式字元編碼。Form data is encoded in plain text, without any control or formatting characters.| 如需有關編碼類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on encoding types, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的編碼類型瀏覽器使用，將資料傳送至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the encoding type the browser uses to send data back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string Method
Public Property Method As String
public: property System::String ^ Method { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Method : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出瀏覽器如何將表單資料傳至伺服器做處理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how a browser posts form data to the server for processing.

value.span: 字串，指出瀏覽器如何將表單資料傳至伺服器。

span.span: A string that indicates how a browser posts form data to the server.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定瀏覽器如何將表單資料傳送給伺服器進行處理。Use this property to specify how the browser sends form data to the server for processing. 所有的瀏覽器支援的兩個常見的方法是`GET`和`POST`。The two common methods supported by all browsers are `GET` and `POST`. > [!CAUTION] > 您可以覆寫此屬性，然後使用的預設值`GET`方法，而非`POST`。You can override the default value of this property and use the `GET` method instead of `POST`. 不過，因為`GET`要求會限制資料量在它們可以包含，請使用`GET`方法可能在某些情況下，會造成回傳和狀態管理所提供的功能 ASP.NET 網頁架構失敗。However, because `GET` requests are limited in how much data they can include, using the `GET` method can, in some cases, cause the postback and state management capabilities provided by the ASP.NET page framework to fail. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定表單資料會回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that form data is posted back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得 控制項的識別項名稱。

span.span: Gets the identifier name for the control.

value.span: 包含 識別項名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the identifier name for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷唯一識別項名稱控制項。Use the property to determine the unique identifier name for an control. 在此實作中，取得這個屬性傳回的值屬性。In this implementation, getting this property returns the value of the property. 不過，將屬性設定不會指派值給屬性。However, setting the property does not assign a value to the property. 將屬性設定不會指派值給這個屬性因為屬性必須有相同的值屬性。Setting the property does not assign a value to this property because the property must have the same value as the property. > [!NOTE] > `name`屬性不且和 XHTML 相容的屬性，而且不會呈現 asp.net 不論`xhtmlConformance`設定。The `name` attribute is not an XHTML-compliant attribute and is not rendered by ASP.NET regardless of the `xhtmlConformance` setting.

related.span: ASP.NET 和 XHTML 相容性

span.span: ASP.NET and XHTML Compliance

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnInit : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當收到通知方法中，Web 伺服器控制項都必須執行才能建立並設定執行個體的任何初始化步驟。When notified by the method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在這個階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法時，無論它是子網域或此控制項的父代。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他伺服器控制項不保證會建立且可供存取。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 此外，呼叫的基底類別方法可確保控制項正確地設定為 Web 網頁表單和頁面的檢視狀態會保存。

span.span: Additionally, calling the base class's method ensures that the control is properly set as the Web page form and the page's view state is persisted.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnPreRender : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫之前轉譯控制項。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 如果屬性設定為`true`，則方法註冊智慧型巡覽指令碼檔案參考，使其呈現。If the property is set to `true`, the method registers the smart navigation script file reference so that it gets rendered. > [!NOTE] > 屬性在 ASP.NET 2.0 版中已被取代。The property has been deprecated in ASP.NET version 2.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現 HTML`

exception.span: 控制項呈現時一定要有 執行個體的參考。

span.span: The control is not rendered without a reference to the instance.

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓正確呈現控制項的子控制項。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's child controls are correctly rendered.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性轉譯為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會使用方法來檢查控制項的屬性，以確保它們可以呈現開頭標記中`
`HTML 項目。The method uses the method to check the control's attributes to ensure that they can be rendered in the opening tag of a `` HTML element. 此外，方法會轉譯`method`， `action`，以及`onsubmit`屬性控制項。Additionally, the method renders the `method`, `action`, and `onsubmit` attributes of the control. 如果設定的控制項 ID屬性未實作介面，擲回例外狀況。If the control ID set in the property does not implement the interface, an exception is thrown. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

exception.span: 屬性中設定的控制項 ID 不是 型別。

span.span: The control ID set in the property is not of the type .

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓控制項的屬性會正確轉譯。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's attributes are correctly rendered.

span.span: Renders the child controls of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現用戶端指令碼，以確保瀏覽器焦點設在指定的控制項屬性。The method renders client script to ensure that the browser focus is set to the control specified in the property. > [!NOTE] > 所指定的控制項屬性會優先於所指定的控制項屬性。A control specified by the property takes precedence over a control specified by the property.

exception.span: Web 網頁有一個以上的伺服器端 標記。

span.span: The Web page has more than one server-side tag.

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓正確呈現控制項的子控制項。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's child controls are correctly rendered.

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值 (Boolean)，指出是否要強制用戶端上已停用的控制項送出其值，讓控制項在網頁回傳至伺服器時保留其值。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether to force controls disabled on the client to submit their values, allowing them to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server.

value.span: 如果用戶端上停用的控制項被強制送出其值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if controls disabled on the client are forced to submit their values; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否要強制用戶端送出其值，當頁面回傳上停用的控制項。Use the property to specify whether to force controls disabled on the client to submit their values when the page posts back. 這可讓停用的控制項在網頁回傳至伺服器，保留其值。This allows the disabled controls to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server. 當屬性設定為`false`，表單上的控制項已停用用戶端指令碼會提交至伺服器回傳網頁在下一次。When the property is set to `false`, controls on the form that have been disabled using client script will not be submitted to the server the next time the page posts back. 如此一來，停用的控制項所儲存的任何值都會遺失。As a result, any values stored by the disabled controls are lost. 若要允許停用的控制項在網頁回傳至伺服器，保留其值，設定屬性設`true`。To allow the disabled controls to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定若要在表單上的屬性`true`造成保留其值，在網頁回傳至伺服器的用戶端指令碼停用的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property on a form to `true` to cause controls disabled by client script to maintain their values after the page posts back to the server. 在此範例中，如果您設定屬性，以`false`，然後按一下**回傳** 按鈕，在 HTML 文字方塊中的文字將會遺失，並不會再選取 HTML 核取方塊。In this example, if you set the property to `false` and then click the **Post back** button, the text in the HTML text box is lost and the HTML check box is no longer selected. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls/CS/htmlform.submitdisabledcontrolscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls/VB/htmlform.submitdisabledcontrolsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Property Target As String
public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定框架 (Frame) 或視窗，在其中呈現張貼至伺服器的資訊結果。

span.span: Gets or sets the frame or window in which to render the results of information that is posted to the server.

value.span: 瀏覽器視窗或框架，顯示張貼至伺服器的資訊結果。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the results of the information posted to the server.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，指定的目標視窗或框架，顯示伺服器所張貼的資訊結果。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the results of the information that is posted to the server. 重新導向結果張貼至伺服器的資訊是進階的工作。Redirecting the results of the information posted to the server is an advanced task. 建議您不要使用這個屬性只是為了回傳。Using this property simply to post back is not recommended. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性上`form`XHTML 1.1 中不允許的項目。The `target` attribute on `form` elements is not allowed in XHTML 1.1. 因此，如果呈現的標記必須符合 XHTML 標準，或必須符合協助工具標準，請勿設定屬性。Therefore, if the rendered markup must conform to XHTML standards or must conform to accessibility standards, do not set the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)並[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). 值必須以內範圍的 A 到 Z （不區分大小寫），除了下列的特殊值，其開頭為底線的字母為開頭。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 `_search` 目標值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用回傳至伺服器的屬性來指定新 unframed 視窗顯示資訊的結果。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a new, unframed window to display the results of the information posted back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlFormTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormTarget/CS/htmlformtargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlFormTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormTarget/VB/htmlformtargetvb.aspx#1)]

member this.UniqueID : string

summary.span: 取得指派給 控制項的唯一程式設計識別項。

span.span: Gets the unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

value.span: 指派給 控制項的唯一程式設計識別項。

span.span: The unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以取得指派給的唯一程式設計識別項控制項。Use the property to get the unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control. 此屬性會覆寫基底實作傳回常數值，當控制項包含在-實作以外，請在頁面上，例如自訂伺服器控制項的物件。This property overrides the base implementation to return a constant value when the control is contained in an -implemented object other than a page, such as a custom server control. 如果命名容器是頁面上，而值控制項的會傳回屬性。If the naming container is a page, the value of the control's property is returned. 屬性和屬性一律傳回相同的值。The property and the property always return the same value. 這很有用，當需要在瀏覽器上呈現控制項控制項的和相同的屬性。This is useful when the control is rendered on a browser that requires the control's and properties to be the same. 若要讓同步處理，這些屬性屬性一律會傳回的值屬性。To keep these properties synchronized, the property always returns the value of the property. > [!NOTE] > `name`屬性不符合 XHTML 標準的屬性，而且預設不會呈現 asp.net。The `name` attribute is not an XHTML-compliant attribute and by default is not rendered by ASP.NET. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要擷取的唯一識別碼屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the unique identifier for an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.UniqueID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.UniqueID/CS/htmlform.uniqueidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.UniqueID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.UniqueID/VB/htmlform.uniqueidvb.aspx#1)]
